parameters.description: The 1-indexed page number to get. The default value is `1`.

schema.title: Page
schema.description: The 1-indexed page number to get. The default value is `1`.

parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The amount of records per page, limited to between 1 and 500 inclusive. The default value is `10`.

schema.title: Recordsperpage
schema.description: The amount of records per page, limited to between 1 and 500 inclusive. The default value is `10`.

parameters.name: recordsPerPage
sort

schema.title: Sort
schema.description: Specifies the sort order for results. If not given, results are sorted by created_at in descending order.

parameters.description: Specifies the sort order for results. If not given, results are sorted by createdAt in descending order.

get.description:
Retrieve all partner campaigns you have shared to Telnyx in a paginated fashion.

This endpoint is currently limited to only returning shared campaigns that Telnyx has accepted. In other words, shared but pending campaigns are currently omitted from the response from this endpoint.
